AdminPage.IntroCopy:
Submission Deadline: November 18, 2011
Student/Employee Voting: November 22 - December 8
Festival Date: December 9 in the Crossroads from 12 - 1pm

Please bring submissions to Brother Davenport in MCK 290A
For more information contact: 208.496.4291

 

All films must fit the following guidelines:

  • Maximum submission length 2 minutes
  • Must be submitted in a DVD format with NO MENUS
  • No graphic violence
  • No corpses: morbidity will be rejected
  • No sexually explicit content
  • Must be Honor Code and Dress Code appropriate
  • Appropriate music: no vulgar language or lyrics or references to Deity. Please avoid using any music that would infringe on copy right agreements.
  • Credits no longer than 7 seconds in length
  • Make it fun and entertaining

 

Specific Instructions:

  • Select one specific college success or study skills tip that you feel students could most benefit from.  Use a metaphor that would make it memorable to other students (see the following videos for examples: http://beta.byui.edu/academic-support-centers/study-skills-tutoring-center/study-skills-videos). You may use quotes, statistics, expert testimony, scripture or doctrine to give your video support.  Music and text support is also appropriate.  You may want to include a challenge to the students at the end of the presentation.
  • These videos are used by many faculty in their courses and if deemed of sufficient quality will be viewed by thousands of students for years to come so give this your best effort.

 

$100 will be awarded to the first place video with $50 to the 2nd place finisher and $25 will be awarded to the third place finisher.  The winning video will be voted on by students from November 22 to December 8 with the winning video being announced December 9.

Thanks and good luck!
